sections.heading: and 32-381. - Legislative finding
sections.text: Definitions.Section 32-382. - Bond authorization.Section 32-383. - Bonds and notes.Section 32-384 to 32-409. - Revenues from lease of the project. Proceeds of bonds previously authorized for other projects allowed to be expended for the project; bond authorization.

sections.heading: to 32-409. - Revenues from lease of the project
sections.text: Proceeds of bonds previously authorized for other projects allowed to be expended for the project; bond authorization. Stadium Oversight Commission. Condemnation of real property for stadium and practice facility sites. Payment of damages. Appeal to S
